# litllm

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `litllm` is to help you mine pdfs for scholarly analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of litllm from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("avahoffman/litllm")
```

## Getting Started

Please follow along with the vignette to learn how to use this package:

https://www.avahoffman.com/litllm/articles/getting_started.html

Please let us know about any bugs or suggestions via [GitHub issues](https://github.com/avahoffman/litllm/issues).
